title: File dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
description: When using code assist, the file gets marked as dirtied but the content remains unchanged. However, the code assist functionality does not appear as expected.
OB: After triggering code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes were made. The code assist functionality does not appear.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Trigger code assist, for example, by pressing Ctrl+Space.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirtied in the editor.
4. Verify that the code assist functionality does not appear.
